## ðŸ”¢ K-means sur les donnÃ©es `iris` (R)

```{r}
library(datasets)
library(jsonlite)
data(iris)
head(iris)
set.seed(123)
km <- kmeans(iris[, 1:4], centers = 3)
iris$Cluster <- as.character(km$cluster)
write_json(iris, "iris_clusters.json", pretty = TRUE, auto_unbox = TRUE)
```
